channel.title: How do i view coordinates on deltascape?
channel.description: im trying to figure out how do i view the coordinates where i am at like the older version where you could see so i can edit where the tellys take me thanks.

item.title: How do i view coordinates on deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); } add this to server and you can get any coord you need while still ingame. Fastest way to get coords

Read full topic

Radical.dude:

Well, first of all “I Uk 0wn4g3 I”, No spoon feeding, and second of all not trying to be a critic, but learn some Java, Common Sense, and Some English. It’s spelled “piety” not “piery” and “Chivalry” not “chivilary”. It spell checks for you, I’m, going to recommend you something to Google “www.dictionary.com”. Just putting my opinion/Perspective.

An opinion we don’t need, really.
